scripts.deploy: npm run version && git add . && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./version.json').version")" && git push
scripts.deploy:patch: npm run version:patch && git add . && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./version.json').version")" && git push
scripts.deploy:minor: npm run version:minor && git add . && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./version.json').version")" && git push
scripts.deploy:major: npm run version:major && git add . && git commit -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./version.json').version")" && git push
